jcr:content.jcr:title: List of political parties in Greenland

contentheadline.headline: List of political parties in Greenland

contentrichtext.text: {{Politics of Greenland}} This is a '''list of [[political party|political parties]] in [[Greenland]]'''. Greenland has a [[multi-party]] system. ==Active parties== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan=2 | Name ! Abbr. ! Ideology ! Leader ! MPs |- ! style="background:#CE0000;" | | [[Forward (Greenland)|Forward]] | S | [[Social democracy]], [[Greenlandic independence]] | [[Aleqa Hammond]] | align="right"| 14 |- ! style="background:#FF0000;" | | [[Inuit Ataqatigiit]] | IA | [[Democratic socialism]],<ref name=copenhagen>{{cite web| last= | first= | title=Greenland wakes up to first power shift in 30 years | publisher=''[[The Copenhagen Post]]'' | date=2009-06-03 | url=http://www.cphpost.dk/news/politics/90-politics/45828-greenland-wakes-up-to-first-power-shift-in-30-years.html | accessdate=2009-06-04}}</ref><ref>[http://www.parties-and-elections.eu/greenland.html Parties and Elections in Europe - The database about parliamentary elections and political parties in Europe, by Wolfram Nordsieck]</ref> [[Separatism]],<ref name=india>{{cite web| last= | first= | title=Pro-independence party wins Greenland parliament election | work=[[Agence France-Presse]] | publisher=''[[The Times of India]]'' | date=2009-06-03 | url=http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/World/Pro-independence-party-wins-Greenland-parliament-election/articleshow/4611464.cms | accessdate=2009-06-04}}</ref><ref>[http://www.parties-and-elections.eu/greenland.html Parties and Elections in Europe - The database about parliamentary elections and political parties in Europe, by Wolfram Nordsieck]</ref> [[Socialism]], [[Left-wing nationalism]], [[Social democracy]], [[Greenlandic independence]] | [[Kuupik Kleist]] | align="right"| 11 |- ! style="background:#000000;" | | [[Democrats (Greenland)|Democrats]] | D | [[Liberalism]], [[Social liberalism]], [[Greenland|Greenlandic]] [[Rigsfællesskabet|unionism]] | [[Jens B. Frederiksen]] | align="right"| 2 |- ! style="background:#E23487;" | | [[Inuit Party]] | PI | [[Left-wing_politics|Left wing]] | [[Nikku Olsen]] | align="right"| 2 |- ! style="background:#018101;" | | [[Solidarity (Greenland)|Solidarity]] | A | [[Conservative liberalism]], [[Nordic agrarian parties|Nordic agrarianism]], [[Greenland|Greenlandic]] [[Rigsfællesskabet|unionism]] | [[Finn Karlsen]] | align="right"| 2 |- ! style="background:#F6ED00;" | | [[Association of Candidates (Greenland)|Association of Candidates]] | K | [[Conservatism]] | [[Anthon Frederiksen]] | align="right"| 0 |} ==Dissolved parties== * [[Labour Party (Greenland)|Labour Party]] * [[Women's Party (Greenland)|Women's Party]] ==References== {{reflist}} {{Greenlandic political parties}} {{North America in topic|List of political parties in}} [[Category:Lists of political parties|Greenland]] [[Category:Political parties in Greenland| ]] [[Category:Greenland-related lists|Political parties in Greenland]]
